5.0: For there is a day – There is a day prepared on which the scouts who stand on the mountains will call aloud ‘Rise! Let us go up to Zion, to the Lord’ because the redemption has come and the Divine Presence returned to her place in Zion:

22.1: when I return – At the time when I bring back the children of captivity to their place they will say ‘May the Lord bless You, dwelling of righteousness’ which refers to Jerusalem.

15.0: and this is the name that He shall call it – This is the name which God will call Jerusalem:
15.1: the Lord is our righteousness – God will make us righteous when she (Jerusalem) is reestablished.
